label: TransportMeans
comment: Reference to a device or method used to convey people, goods, or other objects from place to place.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this logistics means of transport is accompanied by a driver.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The type, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport.
The code specifying the type of logistics means of transport (Reference UNECE Recommendation 28).

referencedBy.comment: Details of transport means inactively carried during the transport movement, such as trucks on a Roll-On/Roll-Off (RORO) ferry.
